verify.name: Verify Snap version
verify.hint: The Snap version installed on your system should be 2.57.4. Please check the output of the `snap version` command and ensure that the version matches the expected value.

verify.name: Verify VLC Snap package installation
verify.hint: The VLC Snap package should be installed on your system. Please check the output of the `snap list` command and ensure that the VLC package is present.

verify.name: Verify VLC Snap package update
verify.hint: The VLC Snap package should be updated to the latest version (3.0.17.3). Please check the output of the `snap list vlc` command and ensure that the version matches the expected value.

steps.title: Managing Snap Packages with Snap Commands

verify.name: Verify Snap package search
verify.hint: The `snap find gimp` command should display the GIMP Snap package. Please check the output and ensure that the GIMP package is listed.

verify.name: Verify Snap package information
verify.hint: The `snap info gimp` command should display the correct information about the GIMP Snap package, including the summary "GNU Image Manipulation Program". Please check the output and ensure that the information is as expected.
